cfdna.cfDNA¶

class cfdna.cfDNA(sam_fn=None, chrom=None, sam_file=None, min_size=1, max_size=1000, paired=True, qcfail=False, mapq_cutoff=25, proportion=1.0, verbose=False, n_jobs=1)[source]¶

Wrapper of fragments for cell-free DNA

cfDNA stores a fragments object

Attributes

chroms

list : List of chromosomes

n_chroms

Number of chromosomes

size

Number of fragments

Methods

call_cnvs([chrom, bin_size, min_length, …])

Call Copy Number Variants (CNVs)

downsample([proportion, n_frags])

Randomly downsample fragments

fragment_profile([chrom, bin_size, genome, …])

Determine fragment profile (ratio of large fragments to small fragments)

peak_distances(peaks[, bin_size, …])

Determine distance between peaks

predict_nucleosomes(wps[, window, …])

Call peaks from WPS

summarize([bin_size, genome, …])

Calculate summary metrics

window_mean_scores(values[, bed_fn, …])

Calculate mean scores for each postion within a window

window_nfr(values[, bed_fn, upstream, …])

Calculate Nucleosome Free Region score per window

wps([chrom, protection, min_length, …])

Calculate Window Protection Score (WPS)

write_summary(summary, output_h5)

Write summary to h5 file
